Naruto forms a [[Sage Art: Magnet Release Rasengan|Magnet Release Rasengan]] while Sasuke uses an enhanced Chidori to strike the opponent from both sides, sealing their movements from the Rasengan's cursed seal markings.

== Trivia ==
* While it was unnamed in the manga and anime, it was named in ''[[Naruto x Boruto: Ninja Voltage]]''.

[[fr:Jiton - Noir Ébène Tourbillonnant]]
